publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3919 Alex Johnstone: Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change—That the Parliament welcomes the cross-party agreement on climate change signed by the Conservative Party, the Liberal Democrats, the Ulster Democratic Unionist Party, Plaid Cymru and the Scottish National Party at Westminster and welcomes the aim of this Conservative initiative, that an independent body should be established to monitor and enforce year-on-year carbon reductions, with the aim of achieving at least 60% by 2050, ensuring that long-term emissions cuts would be guaranteed.

S2M-3919 Alex Johnstone: Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change—That the Parliament welcomes the cross-party agreement on climate change signed by the Conservative Party, the Liberal Democrats, the Ulster Democratic Unionist Party, Plaid Cymru and the Scottish National Party at Westminster and welcomes the aim of this Conservative initiative, that an independent body should be established to monitor and enforce year-on-year carbon reductions, with the aim of achieving at least 60% by 2050, ensuring that long-term emissions cuts would be guaranteed.
S2M-3919 Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change (lodged on 2 February 2006) Nora Radcliffe*

S2M-3919 Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change (lodged on 2 February 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr David Davidson*, Alex Fergusson*, Derek Brownlee*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, John Scott*
S2M-3919 Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change (lodged on 2 February 2006) Phil Gallie*
S2M-3919 Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change (lodged on 2 February 2006) Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-3919 Cross-Party Consensus on Climate Change (lodged on 2 February 2006) Murray Tosh*
